#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,n,i,j,count;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		count=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			for(j=i+1;j<=n;j++)
			{
				if(i*j%(i+j)==0)count++;
			}
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
